item.title: How to set tests as pending in your ExUnit suite
item.description: Elixir's built in testing library is called ExUnit. It's a proper testing framework, which, although simple, gives the developers a lot of power and flexibility. If you come from Ruby land, I am sure you've been in a position where you want to set a certain test to be skipped. For example, RSpec in Ruby does it with the pending method. Let's see how we can customize our test suite so ExUnit can skip over tests in our test suite.
